closed.description: Text of the link to change the issue to 'Closed'.

failed_to_change_to_closed.message: Failed to change this issue to 'Closed'.

cannot_change_to_closed.message: You cannot change this issue to 'Closed'.
cannot_change_to_closed.description: Error message when the user cannot change an issue to 'Closed'.
